QuestData.Title: Dutybound
QuestData.Description:
Welcome to the fight, $n. You're with us now.
Take a moment and introduce yourself. I will meet you by Draven at the lodge.
QuestData.LogDescription: Introduce yourself to General Draven, Nadjia the Mistblade, and Rendle.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet the Accuser at the Fearstalker's Lodge.
